text.div:
PatientNameSearchParameter

Parameter name:string

Searches for patient based on patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?name={name}

ResourcePatient
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesPatient
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: PatientNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for patient based on patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Patient?name={name}
